EBK0.original: You're a moron. Stop gambling. You don't have bad luck, you have bad judgment.
EBK0.translated: 你这个蠢蛋。别赌了。不是运气不好，是你的决断不行。

EBK0.original: I hereby make you a minority shareholder in R.B.E. - I'm the C.E.O. - we're in business, cousin!
EBK0.translated: 特此吸收你为Roman Bellic集团的小股东，我可是CEO，这下我们都迈上正轨了，堂弟！

EBK0.original: I can think for myself, Roman. Thanks.
Get realistic, cousin. I fucked things up in the Old Country. I fucked things up in Europe. Chances are I'm going to fuck things up here.
EBK0.translated: 现实点吧，堂兄。我在故国就搞砸了，在欧洲也搞砸了。在这里多半也会搞砸。

EBK0.original: Great news! Mallorie agreed to marry me! I am so happy. I am going to be a family man. I am so excited - we have had our ups and downs, but she's been a good friend, and once I stopped cheating on her and we became exclusive, it's been great. I cannot wait to marry her. One problem - no more threesomes!
EBK0.translated: 好消息！Mallorie答应嫁给我了！我太高兴了。我要成为有家室的人了。我很兴奋，我们经历了风风雨雨，但她一直待我不薄。只要我不再鬼混，我们两个就是一生挚爱，太棒了。我都等不及要娶她了。只可惜，从此再无3P！

EBK0.original: Cousin, I am so happy for you. I imagine Brucie will be pissed off - missing out on all those threesomes.
EBK0.translated: 真为你高兴，堂兄。我能想象到Brucie失望的表情，因为以后就没有3P了。

EBK0.original: Good for you, cousin. Not so good for Mallorie having to sleep with you for the rest of her life though. Maybe she'll let you bring in some more men for threesomes after a while.
EBK0.translated: 恭喜你，堂兄。只不过Mallorie这辈子都只能跟你上床了。过段时间她可能会允许你带个男人来玩3P。

EBK0.original: Listen, thanks for doing that. I didn't think you'd mind dating a guy after all that time in the merchant navy. Brucie is really grateful. He'll be a good contact for us. Anyway, listen, I know you'll be mad, but I've been having a run of bad luck. The thing about luck is it changes, so maybe you can bail me out? Nothing crazy. Think of it as an investment.
EBK0.translated: 你肯帮忙真是太好了。没想到你在商船队干了这么久，还是不介意跟个男人出去约会。Brucie很感谢你。他能成为我们的好交情。好了，我知道你会生气，但我最近运气不太好。可运气是会变的，所以你就帮你哥我一次吧？不是什么不正经的，你就当成投资好了。

EBK0.original: Maybe you could say that you're a moron and you won't set me up with anymore undercover agents or cops.
EBK0.translated: 你还是承认自己是个白痴吧，以后别给我介绍什么卧底条子了。

EBK0.original: You set me up with a man, and you set me up with a cop. Maybe you should give up the match making, you moron.
EBK0.translated: 先给我找了个男人，又给我整了个警察。你还是别当媒婆了吧，白痴。

EBK0.original: You love trying to get me involved with freaks online, don't you? I'm alright, cousin. - N
EBK0.translated: 你就喜欢给我找一些网上的怪人是吧？我没事，堂兄。 - N

EBK0.original: Cousin, I am so sorry. I don't know what to say. You should have followed my advice, not become fixated with revenge. Give up, please. I am begging you.
EBK0.translated: 堂弟，很遗憾。我不知道该说什么。你就该听从我的建议的，而不是被复仇冲昏头脑。算了吧，拜托。算我求你了。

EBK0.original: Good to see you online cousin! And good to know you in this country, by my side - the Bellic boys showing the world what is up. Man, if our two idiotic, useless, bullying fathers could see us now! They'd turn in their miserable graves! Fuck them. We made it, man. This country is ripe for the plucking. I'm really glad you're here. Listen - we are going to take this shit over, baby!
EBK0.translated: 你终于能上网了，堂弟！你能来到美国，来到我的身边，我很高兴。Bellic兄弟会向世界展现他们的力量的。兄弟，真希望我们那两个白痴废物暴力狂父亲能见到我们的现状！不过他们都已经悲惨入土了！去他妈的。我们成功了，兄弟。这个国家是有胆量的人的舞台。很高兴你也来了。听着，我们要闹他个天翻地覆，宝贝！

EBK0.original: Ok, man. Maybe I'll check this girl out. I'm thinking she's either rejected you or she's crazy because I know you haven't suddenly become Mr. Faithful to Mallorie. - N
EBK0.translated: 好啦，老哥。有空我会了解下这个姑娘的。我看要么是你被她拒绝了，要么是她脑子有病。否则你怎么会突然对Mallorie忠贞不二呢。 - N

EBK0.original: Just saw this freaky dirty girl on www.blogsnobs.org. She's called LiberatedWoman. It seems that if you write about all your sexing on the internet you can be as big a slut as you like and no one gives you any shit for it. Desperate men all over America have got to thank the internet and shows like I'm Rich for that, cousin! You should try to meet her. If it wasn't for Mallorie, these fingers would be squeezing on her titties and not writing an email to you - I'll tell you that!
EBK0.translated: 刚在www.blogsnobs.org看到这个可怕的浪货，她叫「自由女性」。看来，只要在网上记录下你的风骚史，你就可以尽管浪了，别人连个屁都不会放的。全美国欲求不满的男人都应该感谢网络和《我是富豪》这样的节目！你可以约下她试试。这么说吧，要不是有Mallorie在，我已经忙着抚摸她的奶子，没手打字发邮件了！

EBK0.original: Listen, cousin, give that Michelle a call I know she likes you, and you need to get some action. She's a nice girl. You've got her number - call her up.
EBK0.translated: 听着，堂弟，给Michelle打个电话吧，我知道她喜欢你，你也需要性生活。她是个好女孩。你有她的电话号码，打个电话找她吧。

EBK0.original: Shit! Michelle was working for someone? Fuck... I don't know what to say.
EBK0.translated: 我操！Michelle是政府的人？操...我不知道该说什么了。

EBK0.original: Have you been stealing Brucie's juice, cousin? We should try to get out of debt first.
EBK0.translated: 你是偷喝了Brucie的药吗，堂兄？我们还是先把债还了再说吧。

EBK0.original: Roman, how are you ever going to rule the world if you gamble every cent you get away?
EBK0.translated: Roman，把身上的每个子儿都赌光的话你还怎么统治天下？

EBK0.original: Fuck you! It was two chicks. I never dated a man. Unlike you!
EBK0.translated: 操你妈！我说的3P是找两个妹子。我从来没和男人约会过。又不是你！
